title: Light L16 Camera wants to beat DSLR with its 16 lenses and 52-megapixel shots
text:
Light L16 Camera wants to beat DSLR with its 16 lenses and 52-megapixel shots 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Light is a photography company that was founded to make photography better and it may just do that with its L16 Camera. The Light L16 Camera...
